steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project_executions --> navigate to Page_executions
step 4: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_test_cases --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active
step 5: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on hyperlink_defects --> navigate to Page_defects
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page_defects
